page.title: 03RECREATION : CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: POISON:To play Poison you can have as many people as you like.Someone sits down,they are the poison.Then the rest make a ring around them and move about.If anybody touches the person in the middle they're out. MOVING TARGET is when players stand against the wall and someone has a ball and throws it at them.The players who are standing against the wall have to dodge the ball.When someone is hit by the ball they're on it. FRENCH SKIPPING:You need about 3m.of elastic.Then you choose who is going to be first.Two people stand a metre apart,the elastic stretched round their ankles.The other person starts to jump onto the elastic at different angles.When they miss its the next person to go.
